text: "My Immortal" is the third single from American rock band Evanescence's first studio album Fallen. The song was released on December 8, 2003. The song's lyrics were written by guitarist Ben Moody from fiction, and the music was written by pianist Amy Lee, who also added the bridge. It is a piano and power ballad. The lyrics are about a spirit that haunts the memory of a grieving loved one. On the Billboard charts, "My Immortal" was able to peak at #7 on Hot 100, #2 on the Mainstream Top 40, #1 on the Adult Top 40, and #19 on the Adult Contemporary charts. In 2005, the song was nominated for a Grammy Award in the category of Best Pop Performance by a Duo or Group with Vocals. ==References== ==Other websites== *"My Immortal" on YouTube * Category:2003 songs Category:Evanescence songs Category:Pop ballads Category:Rock ballads
